infoList.title: Proven Effective
infoList.content: With a KF60 level of protection, our masks have been proven by the South Korean government to be effective in preventing the spread of Covid19.

infoList.title: Quality Materials
infoList.content: Our masks are 18cm x 9cm and made of 3 ply domestic non-woven fabric (100% polyester). The design is CE certified, meeting EU requirements.

infoList.title: High Capacity
infoList.content: Cleankit has a shipping capacity of 100 million masks a month. We ship from Busan or other Korean ports, with a delivery time of 45-60 days.

infoList.title: Competitive Price
infoList.content: We keep to an affordable price: $0.38 a mask. We are happy to cater to your budget and handling capacity.
